# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a service prediction provider.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

Retain a reference to this instance for as long as you need to receive events from the [doc://com.apple.WirelessInsights/documentation/WirelessInsights/ServicePredictionProvider/servicePredictions] asychronous sequence.
title: init()
